titles.title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on certain sports footwear valued over $6.50 but not over $12/pair.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/9/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce temporarily the duty on certain sports footwear valued over $6.50 but not over $12/pair.
